title: Orchestral Adventure Music Bundle
description: 35 tracks + over 60 minutes of professional, high quality music loops for adventure games
longDescription:
This music bundle contains 35 loopable tracks of original music written and recorded by composer/producer Matteo Palmer. These are professional, AAA-quality tracks, and fit perfectly for a variety of essential game types including action adventure, RPG, platformers, metroidvania, and more. From heroic horns, epic percussion, and sweeping strings, this pack has exactly what you need for towns, battles, dungeons, intimate moments, and much more! Includes all three of Matteo's published music packs, as well as three bonus tracks only available in this bundle!


SAMPLES OF TRACKS AVAILABLE HERE:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K8OiFLYWASw

Number of Audio Wavs: 70

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1kHz

Minutes of audio provided: 60+

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://www.wanderingminstrelmusic.com/
